about_the_game:
Kinny and the Star Track Puzzle

《Kinny and the Star Track Puzzle》 is a story about the friendship between a cosmic witch and a shining cat head.
Embark on a journey through space to illuminate the darkened stars and restore constellations to the world!

Gameplay

You become a cosmic witch and move on a 3x3 board, completing given tasks.
Each stage provides different cards, and you need to use the given cards to clear the objectives.

Cards: Starcall & Move

Using the Starcall card, you can make the tiles on the 3x3 board shine according to the rules.
With the Move card, you can move on the board following the rules.
Strategically combine the Starcall and Move cards to create bingos and clear the stages!

Various Gimmicks

There are 5 constellations(chapters) in the world of 《Kinny and the Star Track Puzzle》.
Each chapter has unique mechanics that you either use or avoid to solve the puzzles.
Stay calm and illuminate the stars even when encountering obstacles such as cliffs that impede movement, dark matter that disables Starcall usage, and monsters that taint the board with darkness!

Hard Mode

When you clear all the stages within a chapter, the hard mode stages will be unlocked.
Clear the hard mode stages and show off your intellect (while finding adorable space animals) to your heart's content!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Any processor w/ SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphic card w/ DX 10 capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8+
  • Processor: Any processor w/ SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: Any graphic card w/ DX 10 capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
